summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1203, for the improvement of First Avenue North, from Galer Street to Lee Street; and Lee Street, from First Avenue North to a point one hundred twenty (120) feet west of the west line of Warren Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing therein a sewer of proper dimensions, together with all necessary appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 13299, and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and appropriating for the collection thereof.
